title: Formative Assessment Design Workshop for Technology-Enhanced Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A short intensive program supporting pre-service teachers in effectively designing and utilizing technology-based formative assessment tools in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can design formative assessment tools that evaluate active information retrieval and spaced repetition learning strategies using learning analytics data.
Learners can interpret learner behavior by analyzing five key variables (e.g., response time, number of attempts, review patterns) extracted from online quiz log data.
Based on learning analytics collected from technology-enhanced platforms, learners can apply methods to provide personalized feedback to individual learners.

resources: Canvas LMS or Similar Technology-Enhanced Learning Platform
Learning Analytics Visualization Tool (e.g., Google Data Studio)
Formative Assessment Template for Mathematics Instruction

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
